Title: Pokemon: Pika Pika Hoshizora Camp
Description: ['Pikachu and some of the other pokemon camp out in the woods and help the Pichu brothers get on the train.']
Related: ['Parent story: Pokemon', 'Sequel: Pokemon: Pikachu no Fuyuyasumi (2000)']
